references.paper_title: Improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper provides improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits, which are foundational to many reinforcement learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: Minimax regret bounds for reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper establishes minimax regret bounds for reinforcement learning, providing a benchmark for the performance of reinforcement learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: Provably efficient reinforcement learning with linear function approximation
references.reason: This paper provides provably efficient reinforcement learning algorithms with linear function approximation, addressing a key challenge in applying reinforcement learning to complex problems.

references.paper_title: Nearly minimax optimal offline reinforcement learning with linear function approximation
references.reason: This paper provides nearly minimax optimal offline reinforcement learning algorithms with linear function approximation, advancing the state-of-the-art in offline reinforcement learning.

references.paper_title: Nearly minimax optimal reinforcement learning for linear Markov decision processes
references.reason: This paper provides nearly minimax optimal reinforcement learning algorithms for linear Markov decision processes, establishing a strong theoretical foundation for reinforcement learning in this setting.
